DATA SCIENCE

SUPERVISED LEARNING

We have expertise in solving problems related to Classification, Regression and ranking. We use the following algorithms to solve these problem
  1. Linear & Logistic regression
  2. Elastic net
  3. Random forest
  4. Boosted trees
  5. Support vector machines
  6. KNN method
  7. Neural Networks & Deep learning

UNSUPERVISED LEARNING

We solve variety of unsupervised learning problems. E.g.
  1. Clustering
  2. Association mining
  3. Segmentation
  4. Dimensionality reduction
  5. Natural Language processing
  6. Face recognition etc

REINFORCEMENT LEARNING

We have experience in creating recommendation system for variety of business problems
